The crash has done some serious damage. Much of his skin has burned away. Chunks of his armor and flesh are missing as well, including a large part of his head, revealing that under his human visage is a NIGHTMARISH CREATURE. Gabriel charges at Jeep fast. Jeep whips up his Glock, BLAM! Gabriel takes the bullet, then slaps the gun out of Jeep's hand. Jeep throws a wild punch, connects with Gabriel's chin, rocking him back. Jeep slowly gets up once more, bleeding, hurt.   Raises his fists. This kid will simply not give up. Then I'd start to have that feeling again and I knew I didn't have a choice. Somehow this had already been decided. And it made me hate this thing that's been growing inside me.  How come you have so much faith in me, Jeep? God knows I've never given you or anybody else a reason to. Or is it that you just can't find any other hard-luck case to follow around?  We have to get `im back in here!  Oh, no.   Audrey...  Do you have no heart?!     She's just a kid!  You can't let her die!  Michael!  I'll get some water!  Where is he?!  Oh, no!  I don't...I...  So are we safe now?   Is it over?  And what happens until then...?  What makes you think I can do that? What makes you think I want to do that? If he's so important, why don't you take him?  What's he talking about?  Michael, what the hell's he talking about?!  Audrey...?  Give him to me!  No...   I...  Wait!     We can't leave him!  Come on, Jeep!  Is this what I think it is?  Jeep, your arm!  What is it?  The swarm, it's fading!  Look, I'm sorry for what I said to you earlier, `bout you following me around. I didn't mean it.  C'mon, Jeep!  Jeep!  Alive.  Nothing could have survived that.  She saved us, Jeep. Audrey saved us. Now c'mon, we gotta go!  How can this happen?  How can this happen in a world so beautiful?  Stop!   Please! Don't kill him!  Stop it!   I'LL GIVE YOU THE BABY!  I don't want this responsibility!  Yep, we sure did.  Taking it in.     Breathing hard.  What if we're on our own now?    Someday when my son is older, I will tell him about the time of his birth when all the world was covered in a great darkness...  ... And how just at the moment when everything seemed lost...  ...a mighty warrior fell in order to save me.  And a boy faced his fear and rose up to save us all.

description: An out-of-the-way diner becomes the unlikely battleground for the survival of the human race. When God loses faith in humankind, he sends his legion of angels to bring on the Apocalypse. Humanity's only hope lies in a group of strangers trapped in a desert diner with the Archangel Michael (Bettany).—Anonymous
name: Legion
